column2: You can borrow 300¤ from some rich ruler or moneylenders.
You repay the gold you owe.
You ask your servants to look for moneylenders who can borrow gold for your goals.\n\nWithin the day, they return with news.
The local community is giving loans... interesting...

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
legends are told about your wealth. May you allow me to borrow a part of your gold. We will return all the gold to the last coin and more.

Signed,
[target_borrower.GetTitledName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
it will be my honor to be your sponsor. You can pay off your debt whenever you want.

Signed,
[target_moneylender.GetTitledName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
to my great regret, I am not able to lend you money.

Signed,
[target_moneylender.GetTitledName]

It has been a long time since you heard the news from [target_moneylender.GetTitledFirstName].\n\nYou have no idea what happened, but looks like at this point we can consider this transaction to be failed.
You won't receive any borrowing letter in the next 10 years
You can try to borrow 300¤ from §Y[From.GetBestName]§!.
Have NOT asked not to bother
